message.content:
Sure, let's break it down:

When you were 6, your sister was half your age, which means she was 6/2 = 3 years old.

Now, you are 80 years old. The time that has passed since you were 6 is 80 - 6 = 74 years.

During these 74 years, your sister would have aged as well. So, we add the 74 years to her age at that time: 3 + 74 = 77.

So, your sister would be 77 years old now.
